evoter.mobile.main

Class OfflineEVoterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.mobile.main.OfflineEVoterManager

  • public class OfflineEVoterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    OfflineEVoterManager manages user, database,.. for different session of eVoterMobile Application Created by luongnv89 on 03/01/14.
